extendedInfo.description: * Try FREE DEMO on the Play Store first! *Stream video and audio from your Android deviceâs camera directly across your Wi-Fi network in real-time, to be viewed and remotely controlled in a web browser or on another Android device.  Can be used to spy on people, a serious surveillance device or just for fun!What will you LiveStream?* If you want to use this application as a baby monitor, then you should download âBabyCam Monitorâ which is also from dooblou â it does everything this app does but has more features specific to monitoring babies safely. ** BEST LiveStream application available on the Android Market! *"The UI is well constructed: simple and intuitive ... easy to use, even for those who donât have any previous experience ... the sound quality is good â not even a lot of real network cameras can deliver that much!" - AndroidPIT review - "Very Good"------FEATURES1. Stream real-time live video and audio from your Android device camera to a web browser;2. Can also stream directly to another Android device (in conjunction with SECuRET SpyCam);3. Very simple to use for everybody - no configuration needed and no intermediate/external servers involved;4. Remotely control the camera!  Take full resolution pictures and hi-def videos using the web browser (requires Android 2.2 or above); 5. Choose between the front and back camera (requires Android 2.3 or above and a front camera);6. Disguise mode and touch screen locking so your device can't be detected; 7. Requires Java installed on the web browser computer; 8. Advanced settings to tweak performance;9. Choice of streaming resolutions;  10. Only uses a WiFi network â does NOT support 3G;11. LOTS more features in development.------* Before emailing, check FAQs at http://dooblou.blogspot.com ** Follow @dooblou on Twitter for all the latest news and updates as they occur ** Find us on Facebook â Search for âSECuRETâ *------Part of the SECuRET range of camera applications:- SECuRET SpyCam is a motion triggered camera application.- SECuRET LiveStream is a wifi-streaming camera appication.- SECuRET RemoteControl is a camera application controlled by SMS.------If you do have problems using this application on your WiFi network, it is most likely a configuration problem with your router/network.  Please contact the developer if you have any questions and he may be able to help you ... but please don't rate low because your network isn't configured properly - that isn't the applicationâs fault ;)

reviews.title: Very easy to use and stable
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for me, not expensive, very easy to use and most important is very very stable. Great buy for a dollar:)
reviews.author: Amel Brkic

reviews.title: BEST DOLLAR I EVER SPENT
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t get a plugin issue sorted out in Firefox due to laziness, but its streaming just fine in IE. I just wish there was an option to change from landscape to portrait. Anyways, I wanted this app to catch my roommates in the act of eating my food. For a dollar, I no longer have to worry about spending more than necessary on groceries.
reviews.author: Donna Walmack

reviews.title: Works Awesome
reviews.comment: People giving it 1 star because they can\'t figure it out are a joke.  I use my Verizon jetpack as a portable router, uses no data to link laptop to phone.
reviews.author: Chris Lupinski

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: The best in it\'s class. Stable and easy to set-up. Reliable and has a nice UI plus useful add-ons.
reviews.author: Erich Espinosa

reviews.title: Can\'t recommend
reviews.comment: Tried to use this as a monitoring device with an old Android phone, Firstly, nothing to do with developer, getting the app on the phone was a nightmare, Google\'s issue, had to set up a new account, even though one already existed for said device. Once installed it worked - for a while - then started to jitter. Restart, cured, but that\'s not the point, I want continuous monitoring, not intermittent, in fairness, it could be a battery problem with the device. The app is fine, but don\'t expect bells and whistles. Basic, yes, but it doesn\'t do what I want it to do. The BabyCam Monitor might be better, but for monitoring an adult with dementia, the interface sucks.  It works, but don\'t expect miracles.  Also have serious issues with the use of Java.
reviews.author: Martyn Feather

reviews.title: No server available for macos
reviews.comment: Windows only servers.  That wasnt stated up front. Lost a dollar.
reviews.author: Cere Mony

reviews.title: Excellent streaming to Firefox ...
reviews.comment: ... on my desktop from Motorola DROID RaZr M.  Set camera for 720p video capture ... very good.  Controlled the \"torch\" remotely and also snapped still pics.  Next test: stream to SECuRET SpyCam running on another Android.  Yea, babay!!!!
